00023 #include <Catch_SIGINIT.h>
00024 
00025 Nom Catch_SIGINIT::NOM_DU_CAS_ = "";
00026 int Catch_SIGINIT::NB_CAUGHT_SIGNALS_=0;
00027 
00028 void Catch_SIGINIT::signal_callback_handler(True_int signum)
00029 {
00030   if (NB_CAUGHT_SIGNALS_ < 2)
00031     {
00032       if (Process::je_suis_maitre())
00033         {
00034           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00035           std::cerr << "=======================================================" << std::endl;
00036           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00037           std::cerr << "Caught signal " << signum << std::endl;
00038           std::cerr << "We are trying to finish the simulation correctly ... " << std::endl;
00039           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00040           std::cerr << "=======================================================" << std::endl;
00041           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00042         }
00043     }
00044   else //!< force an exit
00045     {
00046       if (Process::je_suis_maitre())
00047         {
00048           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00049           std::cerr << "=======================================================" << std::endl;
00050           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00051           std::cerr << "Multiple signals " << signum <<" are caught !" << std::endl;
00052           std::cerr << "We are forcing the exit of the processors ... " << std::endl;
00053           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00054           std::cerr << "=======================================================" << std::endl;
00055           std::cerr << " " << std::endl;
00056         }
00057       Process::exit();
00058     }
00059 
00060 // Terminate TRUST correctly => print 1 in stop file
00061   Nom command = "echo '1' > ";
00062   command += NOM_DU_CAS_;
00063   command += ".stop";
00064 
00065   NB_CAUGHT_SIGNALS_++; //!< force an exit when nb_caught_signals = 2 (3 tries)
00066 
00067   int err = system(command);
00068   if (err)
00069     {
00070       if (Process::je_suis_maitre())
00071         std::cerr << "We can not finish the simulation correctly because the stop file " << NOM_DU_CAS_<<".stop is not in the directory !" << std::endl;
00072       Process::exit();
00073     }
00074 }
